verses.verse: הַדָּבָר֙ <WH1697> The word אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> that הָיָ֣ה <WH1961> came אֶֽל־ <WH413> to יִרְמְיָ֔הוּ <WH3414> that came to Jeremiah מֵאֵ֥ת <WH853> יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> from the LORD לֵאמֹֽר׃ <WH559> saying

עֲמֹ֗ד <WH5975> Stand בְּשַׁ֙עַר֙ <WH8179> in the gate בֵּ֣ית <WH1004> house יְהוָ֔ה <WH3068> of the LORD'S וְקָרָ֣אתָ <WH7121> and proclaim שָּׁ֔ם <WH8033> there אֶת־ <WH853> הַדָּבָ֖ר <WH1697> there this word הַזֶּ֑ה <WH2088> this וְאָמַרְתָּ֞ <WH559> and say שִׁמְע֣וּ <WH8085> Hear דְבַר־ <WH1697> the word יְהוָ֗ה <WH3068> of the LORD כָּל־ <WH3605> all יְהוּדָה֙ <WH3063> all [ye of] Judah הַבָּאִים֙ <WH935> that enter in בַּשְּׁעָרִ֣ים <WH8179> at these gates הָאֵ֔לֶּה <WH428> these לְהִֽשְׁתַּחֲוֹ֖ת <WH7812> to worship לַיהוָֽה׃ <WH3068> the LORD ס

כֹּֽה־ <WH3541> Thus אָמַ֞ר <WH559> Thus saith יְהוָ֤ה <WH3068> the LORD צְבָאוֹת֙ <WH6635> of hosts אֱלֹהֵ֣י <WH430> the God יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <WH3478> of Israel הֵיטִ֥יבוּ <WH3190> Amend דַרְכֵיכֶ֖ם <WH1870> your ways וּמַֽעַלְלֵיכֶ֑ם <WH4611> and your doings וַאֲשַׁכְּנָ֣ה <WH7931> and I will cause you to dwell אֶתְכֶ֔ם <WH853> בַּמָּק֥וֹם <WH4725> in this place הַזֶּֽה׃ <WH2088> this

אַל־ <WH408> not תִּבְטְח֣וּ <WH982> Trust לָכֶ֔ם אֶל־ <WH413> about דִּבְרֵ֥י <WH1697> words הַשֶּׁ֖קֶר <WH8267> ye not in lying לֵאמֹ֑ר <WH559> saying הֵיכַ֤ל <WH1964> The temple יְהוָה֙ <WH3068> of the LORD הֵיכַ֣ל <WH1964> The temple יְהוָ֔ה <WH3068> of the LORD הֵיכַ֥ל <WH1964> The temple יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> of the LORD הֵֽמָּה׃ <WH1992> This

כִּ֤י <WH3588> For אִם־ <WH518> if הֵיטֵיב֙ <WH3190> For if ye throughly תֵּיטִ֔יבוּ <WH3190> amend אֶת־ <WH853> דַּרְכֵיכֶ֖ם <WH1870> your ways וְאֶת־ <WH853> מַֽעַלְלֵיכֶ֑ם <WH4611> and your doings אִם־ <WH518> if עָשׂ֤וֹ <WH6213> if ye throughly תַֽעֲשׂוּ֙ <WH6213> execute מִשְׁפָּ֔ט <WH4941> judgment בֵּ֥ין <WH996> between אִ֖ישׁ <WH376> between a man וּבֵ֥ין <WH996> between רֵעֵֽהוּ׃ <WH7453> and his neighbour

גֵּ֣ר <WH1616> not the stranger יָת֤וֹם <WH3490> the fatherless וְאַלְמָנָה֙ <WH490> and the widow לֹ֣א <WH3808> nor תַֽעֲשֹׁ֔קוּ <WH6231> [If] ye oppress וְדָ֣ם <WH1818> blood נָקִ֔י <WH5355> not innocent אַֽל־ <WH408> not תִּשְׁפְּכ֖וּ <WH8210> and shed בַּמָּק֣וֹם <WH4725> in this place הַזֶּ֑ה <WH2088> this וְאַחֲרֵ֨י <WH310> after אֱלֹהִ֧ים <WH430> gods אֲחֵרִ֛ים <WH312> other לֹ֥א <WH3808> nor תֵלְכ֖וּ <WH1980> walk לְרַ֥ע <WH7451> to your hurt לָכֶֽם׃

וְשִׁכַּנְתִּ֤י <WH7931> Then will I cause you to dwell אֶתְכֶם֙ <WH853> בַּמָּק֣וֹם <WH4725> in this place הַזֶּ֔ה <WH2088> this בָּאָ֕רֶץ <WH776> in the land אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> i נָתַ֖תִּי <WH5414> that I gave לַאֲבֽוֹתֵיכֶ֑ם <WH1> to your fathers לְמִן־ <WH4480> at עוֹלָ֖ם <WH5769> ever וְעַד־ <WH5704> for עוֹלָֽם׃ <WH5769> and ever

הִנֵּ֤ה <WH2009> Behold אַתֶּם֙ <WH859> you בֹּטְחִ֣ים <WH982> Behold ye trust לָכֶ֔ם עַל־ <WH5921> and דִּבְרֵ֖י <WH1697> words הַשָּׁ֑קֶר <WH8267> in lying לְבִלְתִּ֖י <WH1115> to no הוֹעִֽיל׃ <WH3276> that cannot profit

הֲגָנֹ֤ב ׀ <WH1589> Will ye steal רָצֹ֙חַ֙ <WH7523> murder וְֽנָאֹ֔ף <WH5003> and commit adultery וְהִשָּׁבֵ֥עַ <WH7650> and swear לַשֶּׁ֖קֶר <WH8267> falsely וְקַטֵּ֣ר <WH6999> and burn incense לַבָּ֑עַל <WH1168> unto Baal וְהָלֹ֗ךְ <WH1980> and walk אַחֲרֵ֛י <WH310> after אֱלֹהִ֥ים <WH430> gods אֲחֵרִ֖ים <WH312> other אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> after לֹֽא־ <WH3808> you have not יְדַעְתֶּֽם׃ <WH3045> whom ye know

וּבָאתֶ֞ם <WH935> And come וַעֲמַדְתֶּ֣ם <WH5975> and stand לְפָנַ֗י <WH6440> before בַּבַּ֤יִת <WH1004> me in this house הַזֶּה֙ <WH2088> this אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> which נִקְרָא־ <WH7121> which is called שְׁמִ֣י <WH8034> by my name עָלָ֔יו <WH5921> and וַאֲמַרְתֶּ֖ם <WH559> and say נִצַּ֑לְנוּ <WH5337> We are delivered לְמַ֣עַן <WH4616> because of עֲשׂ֔וֹת <WH6213> to do אֵ֥ת <WH853> כָּל־ <WH3605> all הַתּוֹעֵב֖וֹת <WH8441> Tolaites הָאֵֽלֶּה׃ <WH428> these

הַמְעָרַ֣ת <WH4631> become a den פָּרִצִ֗ים <WH6530> of robbers הָיָ֨ה <WH1961> become הַבַּ֧יִת <WH1004> Is this house הַזֶּ֛ה <WH2088> has this אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> which נִקְרָֽא־ <WH7121> which is called שְׁמִ֥י <WH8034> by my name עָלָ֖יו <WH5921> and בְּעֵינֵיכֶ֑ם <WH5869> affliction גַּ֧ם <WH1571> even אָנֹכִ֛י <WH595> I הִנֵּ֥ה <WH2009> behold רָאִ֖יתִי <WH7200> have seen נְאֻם־ <WH5002> [it] saith יְהוָֽה׃ <WH3069> God ס

כִּ֣י <WH3588> But לְכוּ־ <WH1980> go נָ֗א <WH4994> now אֶל־ <WH413> to מְקוֹמִי֙ <WH4725> ye now unto my place אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> which בְּשִׁיל֔וֹ <WH7887> which [was] in Shiloh אֲשֶׁ֨ר <WH834> what שִׁכַּ֧נְתִּֽי <WH7931> where I set שְׁמִ֛י <WH8034> my name שָׁ֖ם <WH8033> at בָּרִֽאשׁוֹנָ֑ה <WH7223> at the first וּרְאוּ֙ <WH7200> and see אֵ֣ת <WH853> אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> which עָשִׂ֣יתִי <WH6213> what I did ל֔וֹ מִפְּנֵ֕י <WH6440> to it for רָעַ֖ת <WH7451> the wickedness עַמִּ֥י <WH5971> of my people יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <WH3478> Israel

וְעַתָּ֗ה <WH6258> and now יַ֧עַן <WH3282> because עֲשׂוֹתְכֶ֛ם <WH6213> And now because ye have done אֶת־ <WH853> כָּל־ <WH3605> all הַמַּֽעֲשִׂ֥ים <WH4639> all these works הָאֵ֖לֶּה <WH428> these נְאֻם־ <WH5002> saith יְהוָ֑ה <WH3068> the LORD וָאֲדַבֵּ֨ר <WH1696> and I spake אֲלֵיכֶ֜ם <WH413> to you הַשְׁכֵּ֤ם <WH7925> unto you rising up early וְדַבֵּר֙ <WH1696> and speaking וְלֹ֣א <WH3808> did not שְׁמַעְתֶּ֔ם <WH8085> but ye heard וָאֶקְרָ֥א <WH7121> not and I called אֶתְכֶ֖ם <WH853> וְלֹ֥א <WH3808> did not עֲנִיתֶֽם׃ <WH6030> you but ye answered

וְעָשִׂ֜יתִי <WH6213> Therefore will I do לַבַּ֣יִת ׀ <WH1004> unto [this] house אֲשֶׁ֧ר <WH834> which נִֽקְרָא־ <WH7121> which is called שְׁמִ֣י <WH8034> by my name עָלָ֗יו <WH5921> in אֲשֶׁ֤ר <WH834> which אַתֶּם֙ <WH859> you בֹּטְחִ֣ים <WH982> wherein ye trust בּ֔וֹ וְלַ֨מָּק֔וֹם <WH4725> and unto the place אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> which נָתַ֥תִּי <WH5414> which I gave לָכֶ֖ם וְלַאֲבֽוֹתֵיכֶ֑ם <WH1> to you and to your fathers כַּאֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> which עָשִׂ֖יתִי <WH6213> as I have done לְשִׁלֽוֹ׃ <WH7887> to Shiloh

וְהִשְׁלַכְתִּ֥י <WH7993> And I will cast you out אֶתְכֶ֖ם <WH853> מֵעַ֣ל <WH5921> out פָּנָ֑י <WH6440> of my sight כַּאֲשֶׁ֤ר <WH834> I הִשְׁלַ֙כְתִּי֙ <WH7993> as I have cast out אֶת־ <WH853> כָּל־ <WH3605> all אֲחֵיכֶ֔ם <WH251> all your brethren אֵ֖ת <WH853> כָּל־ <WH3605> all זֶ֥רַע <WH2233> [even] the whole seed אֶפְרָֽיִם׃ <WH669> of Ephraim ס

וְאַתָּ֞ה <WH859> you אַל־ <WH408> nay תִּתְפַּלֵּ֣ל ׀ <WH6419> Therefore pray בְּעַד־ <WH1157> for them הָעָ֣ם <WH5971> not thou for this people הַזֶּ֗ה <WH2088> this וְאַל־ <WH408> not תִּשָּׂ֧א <WH5375> neither lift up בַעֲדָ֛ם <WH1157> up רִנָּ֥ה <WH7440> cry וּתְפִלָּ֖ה <WH8605> nor prayer וְאַל־ <WH408> not תִּפְגַּע־ <WH6293> neither make intercession בִּ֑י כִּי־ <WH3588> for אֵינֶ֥נִּי <WH369> not שֹׁמֵ֖עַ <WH8085> to me for I will not hear אֹתָֽךְ׃ <WH853>

הַֽאֵינְךָ֣ <WH369> not רֹאֶ֔ה <WH7200> Seest מָ֛ה <WH4100> what הֵ֥מָּה <WH1992> they עֹשִׂ֖ים <WH6213> thou not what they do בְּעָרֵ֣י <WH5892> in the cities יְהוּדָ֑ה <WH3063> of Judah וּבְחֻצ֖וֹת <WH2351> and in the streets יְרוּשָׁלִָֽם׃ <WH3389> Jerusalem

הַבָּנִ֞ים <WH1121> The children מְלַקְּטִ֣ים <WH3950> gather עֵצִ֗ים <WH6086> wood וְהָֽאָבוֹת֙ <WH1> and the fathers מְבַעֲרִ֣ים <WH1197> kindle אֶת־ <WH853> הָאֵ֔שׁ <WH784> the fire וְהַנָּשִׁ֖ים <WH802> and the women לָשׁ֣וֹת <WH3888> knead בָּצֵ֑ק <WH1217> [their] dough לַעֲשׂ֨וֹת <WH6213> to make כַּוָּנִ֜ים <WH3561> cakes לִמְלֶ֣כֶת <WH4446> to the queen הַשָּׁמַ֗יִם <WH8064> of heaven וְהַסֵּ֤ךְ <WH5258> and to pour out נְסָכִים֙ <WH5262> drink offerings לֵאלֹהִ֣ים <WH430> gods אֲחֵרִ֔ים <WH312> unto other לְמַ֖עַן <WH4616> order הַכְעִסֵֽנִי׃ <WH3707> that they may provoke me to anger

הַאֹתִ֛י <WH853> הֵ֥ם <WH1992> they מַכְעִסִ֖ים <WH3707> Do they provoke me to anger נְאֻם־ <WH5002> ? saith יְהוָ֑ה <WH3068> the LORD הֲל֣וֹא <WH3808> not אֹתָ֔ם <WH853> לְמַ֖עַן <WH4616> because of בֹּ֥שֶׁת <WH1322> [do they] not [provoke] themselves to the confusion פְּנֵיהֶֽם׃ <WH6440> their own ס

לָכֵ֞ן <WH3651> Therefore כֹּה־ <WH3541> thus אָמַ֣ר ׀ <WH559> Therefore thus saith אֲדֹנָ֣י <WH136> the Lord יְהֹוִ֗ה <WH3069> GOD הִנֵּ֨ה <WH2009> Behold אַפִּ֤י <WH639> Behold mine anger וַֽחֲמָתִי֙ <WH2534> and my fury נִתֶּ֙כֶת֙ <WH5413> shall be poured out אֶל־ <WH413> about הַמָּק֣וֹם <WH4725> upon this place הַזֶּ֔ה <WH2088> this עַל־ <WH5921> on הָֽאָדָם֙ <WH120> upon man וְעַל־ <WH5921> and on הַבְּהֵמָ֔ה <WH929> and upon beast וְעַל־ <WH5921> and on עֵ֥ץ <WH6086> and upon the trees הַשָּׂדֶ֖ה <WH7704> of the field וְעַל־ <WH5921> and on פְּרִ֣י <WH6529> and upon the fruit הָֽאֲדָמָ֑ה <WH127> of the ground וּבָעֲרָ֖ה <WH1197> and it shall burn וְלֹ֥א <WH3808> not תִכְבֶּֽה׃ <WH3518> and shall not be quenched ס

כֹּ֥ה <WH3541> Thus אָמַ֛ר <WH559> Thus saith יְהוָ֥ה <WH3068> the LORD צְבָא֖וֹת <WH6635> of hosts אֱלֹהֵ֣י <WH430> the God יִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <WH3478> of Israel עֹלוֹתֵיכֶ֛ם <WH5930> your burnt offerings סְפ֥וּ <WH5595> Put עַל־ <WH5921> unto זִבְחֵיכֶ֖ם <WH2077> unto your sacrifices וְאִכְל֥וּ <WH398> and eat בָשָֽׂר׃ <WH1320> flesh

כִּ֠י <WH3588> for לֹֽא־ <WH3808> did not דִבַּ֤רְתִּי <WH1696> For I spake אֶת־ <WH854> for אֲבֽוֹתֵיכֶם֙ <WH1> not unto your fathers וְלֹ֣א <WH3808> or צִוִּיתִ֔ים <WH6680> nor commanded בְּי֛וֹם <WH3117> them in the day [הֹוצִיא כ] (הֹוצִיאִ֥י <WH3318> after ק) אוֹתָ֖ם <WH853> מֵאֶ֣רֶץ <WH776> of the land מִצְרָ֑יִם <WH4714> of Egypt עַל־ <WH5921> and דִּבְרֵ֥י <WH1697> concerning עוֹלָ֖ה <WH5930> burnt offerings וָזָֽבַח׃ <WH2077> or sacrifices

כִּ֣י <WH3588> for אִֽם־ <WH518> lo אֶת־ <WH853> הַדָּבָ֣ר <WH1697> But this thing הַ֠זֶּה <WH2088> this צִוִּ֨יתִי <WH6680> commanded אוֹתָ֤ם <WH853> לֵאמֹר֙ <WH559> I them saying שִׁמְע֣וּ <WH8085> Obey בְקוֹלִ֔י <WH6963> my voice וְהָיִ֤יתִי <WH1961> become לָכֶם֙ לֵֽאלֹהִ֔ים <WH430> and I will be your God וְאַתֶּ֖ם <WH859> you תִּֽהְיוּ־ <WH1961> become לִ֣י לְעָ֑ם <WH5971> and ye shall be my people וַהֲלַכְתֶּ֗ם <WH1980> and walk בְּכָל־ <WH3605> all הַדֶּ֙רֶךְ֙ <WH1870> ye in all the ways אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> which אֲצַוֶּ֣ה <WH6680> that I have commanded אֶתְכֶ֔ם <WH853> לְמַ֖עַן <WH4616> that it יִיטַ֥ב <WH3190> you that it may be well לָכֶֽם׃

וְלֹ֤א <WH3808> did not שָֽׁמְעוּ֙ <WH8085> But they hearkened וְלֹֽא־ <WH3808> or הִטּ֣וּ <WH5186> not nor inclined אֶת־ <WH853> אָזְנָ֔ם <WH241> their ear וַיֵּֽלְכוּ֙ <WH1980> walked בְּמֹ֣עֵצ֔וֹת <WH4156> in the counsels בִּשְׁרִר֖וּת <WH8307> [and] in the imagination לִבָּ֣ם <WH3820> heart הָרָ֑ע <WH7451> of their evil וַיִּהְי֥וּ <WH1961> and went לְאָח֖וֹר <WH268> and went backward וְלֹ֥א <WH3808> and not לְפָנִֽים׃ <WH6440> and not forward

לְמִן־ <WH4480> Since הַיּ֗וֹם <WH3117> Since the day אֲשֶׁ֨ר <WH834> after יָצְא֤וּ <WH3318> came forth out אֲבֽוֹתֵיכֶם֙ <WH1> that your fathers מֵאֶ֣רֶץ <WH776> of the land מִצְרַ֔יִם <WH4714> of Egypt עַ֖ד <WH5704> until הַיּ֣וֹם <WH3117> unto this day הַזֶּ֑ה <WH2088> this וָאֶשְׁלַ֤ח <WH7971> I have even sent אֲלֵיכֶם֙ <WH413> about אֶת־ <WH853> כָּל־ <WH3605> all עֲבָדַ֣י <WH5650> unto you all my servants הַנְּבִיאִ֔ים <WH5030> the prophets י֖וֹם <WH3117> daily הַשְׁכֵּ֥ם <WH7925> rising up early וְשָׁלֹֽחַ׃ <WH7971> and sending

וְל֤וֹא <WH3808> did not שָׁמְעוּ֙ <WH8085> Yet they hearkened אֵלַ֔י <WH413> about וְלֹ֥א <WH3808> or הִטּ֖וּ <WH5186> not unto me nor inclined אֶת־ <WH853> אָזְנָ֑ם <WH241> their ear וַיַּקְשׁוּ֙ <WH7185> but hardened אֶת־ <WH853> עָרְפָּ֔ם <WH6203> their neck הֵרֵ֖עוּ <WH7489> they did worse מֵאֲבוֹתָֽם׃ <WH1> than their fathers

וְדִבַּרְתָּ֤ <WH1696> Therefore thou shalt speak אֲלֵיהֶם֙ <WH413> about אֶת־ <WH853> כָּל־ <WH3605> all הַדְּבָרִ֣ים <WH1697> all these words הָאֵ֔לֶּה <WH428> these וְלֹ֥א <WH3808> they will not יִשְׁמְע֖וּ <WH8085> unto them but they will not hearken אֵלֶ֑יךָ <WH413> to you וְקָרָ֥אתָ <WH7121> to thee thou shalt also call אֲלֵיהֶ֖ם <WH413> about וְלֹ֥א <WH3808> they will not יַעֲנֽוּכָה׃ <WH6030> unto them but they will not answer

וְאָמַרְתָּ֣ <WH559> But thou shalt say אֲלֵיהֶ֗ם <WH413> to זֶ֤ה <WH2088> This הַגּוֹי֙ <WH1471> unto them This [is] a nation אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> after לֽוֹא־ <WH3808> did not שָׁמְע֗וּ <WH8085> that obeyeth בְּקוֹל֙ <WH6963> not the voice יְהוָ֣ה <WH3068> of the LORD אֱלֹהָ֔יו <WH430> their God וְלֹ֥א <WH3808> or לָקְח֖וּ <WH3947> nor receiveth מוּסָ֑ר <WH4148> correction אָֽבְדָה֙ <WH6> is perished הָֽאֱמוּנָ֔ה <WH530> truth וְנִכְרְתָ֖ה <WH3772> and is cut off מִפִּיהֶֽם׃ <WH6310> from their mouth ס

גָּזִּ֤י <WH1494> Cut off נִזְרֵךְ֙ <WH5145> thine hair וְֽהַשְׁלִ֔יכִי <WH7993> [O Jerusalem] and cast [it] away וּשְׂאִ֥י <WH5375> and take up עַל־ <WH5921> on שְׁפָיִ֖ם <WH8205> on high places קִינָ֑ה <WH7015> a lamentation כִּ֚י <WH3588> for מָאַ֣ס <WH3988> hath rejected יְהוָ֔ה <WH3068> for the LORD וַיִּטֹּ֖שׁ <WH5203> and forsaken אֶת־ <WH853> דּ֥וֹר <WH1755> the generation עֶבְרָתֽוֹ׃ <WH5678> of his wrath

כִּֽי־ <WH3588> for עָשׂ֨וּ <WH6213> have done בְנֵי־ <WH1121> For the children יְהוּדָ֥ה <WH3063> of Judah הָרַ֛ע <WH7451> evil בְּעֵינַ֖י <WH5869> in my sight נְאֻום־ <WH5002> saith יְהוָ֑ה <WH3068> the LORD שָׂ֣מוּ <WH7760> they have set שִׁקּֽוּצֵיהֶ֗ם <WH8251> their abominations בַּבַּ֛יִת <WH1004> in the house אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> which נִקְרָא־ <WH7121> which is called שְׁמִ֥י <WH8034> by my name עָלָ֖יו <WH5921> unto לְטַמְּאֽוֹ׃ <WH2930> to pollute

וּבָנ֞וּ <WH1129> And they have built בָּמ֣וֹת <WH1116> the high places הַתֹּ֗פֶת <WH8612> of Tophet אֲשֶׁר֙ <WH834> which בְּגֵ֣יא <WH1516> which [is] in the valley בֶן־ <WH1121> of the son הִנֹּ֔ם <WH2011> of Hinnom לִשְׂרֹ֛ף <WH8313> to burn אֶת־ <WH853> בְּנֵיהֶ֥ם <WH1323> and their daughters וְאֶת־ <WH853> בְּנֹתֵיהֶ֖ם <WH1121> their sons בָּאֵ֑שׁ <WH784> in the fire אֲשֶׁר֙ <WH834> which לֹ֣א <WH3808> did not צִוִּ֔יתִי <WH6680> which I commanded וְלֹ֥א <WH3808> did not עָלְתָ֖ה <WH5927> [them] not neither came עַל־ <WH5921> into לִבִּֽי׃ <WH3820> it into my heart ס

לָכֵ֞ן <WH3651> Therefore הִנֵּֽה־ <WH2009> behold יָמִ֤ים <WH3117> Therefore behold the days בָּאִים֙ <WH935> come נְאֻם־ <WH5002> saith יְהוָ֔ה <WH3068> the LORD וְלֹא־ <WH3808> will no יֵאָמֵ֨ר <WH559> that it shall no more be called ע֤וֹד <WH5750> longer הַתֹּ֙פֶת֙ <WH8612> Tophet וְגֵ֣יא <WH1516> nor the valley בֶן־ <WH1121> of the son הִנֹּ֔ם <WH2011> of Hinnom כִּ֖י <WH3588> for אִם־ <WH518> but גֵּ֣יא <WH1516> but the valley הַהֲרֵגָ֑ה <WH2028> of slaughter וְקָבְר֥וּ <WH6912> for they shall bury בְתֹ֖פֶת <WH8612> in Tophet מֵאֵ֥ין <WH369> till there be no מָקֽוֹם׃ <WH4725> place

וְֽהָ֨יְתָ֜ה <WH1961> become נִבְלַ֨ת <WH5038> And the carcases הָעָ֤ם <WH5971> of this people הַזֶּה֙ <WH2088> of this לְמַֽאֲכָ֔ל <WH3978> shall be meat לְע֥וֹף <WH5775> for the fowls הַשָּׁמַ֖יִם <WH8064> of the heaven וּלְבֶהֱמַ֣ת <WH929> and for the beasts הָאָ֑רֶץ <WH776> of the earth וְאֵ֖ין <WH369> and no מַחֲרִֽיד׃ <WH2729> and none shall fray [them] away
